ComicInfo.Summary: Neon-tinted tales of today and tomorrow featuring junkie dogs, hungry rabbits, giant monsters, post-nuke mutants, a duck and celestial hamburgers, featuring brand new comics by Victor Kerlow (Everything Takes Forever, The New Yorker), Josh Burggraf (Kid Space Heater, Future Shock), Anthony Meloro (Misper), Josh Freydkis (Fox ADHD, Mishka), Jason Murphy (MeNutNutNut), Amy Searles (Jeans Comics) and Ken Johnson (Artforum, the New York Times)!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-01 15:37:18. [CVDB464191]
ComicInfo.Writer: Anthony Meloro, Jason Murphy, Josh Burggraf, Josh Freydkis, Victor Kerlow
ComicInfo.Penciller: Amy Searles, Anthony Meloro, Jason Murphy, Josh Burggraf, Josh Freydkis, Victor Kerlow
ComicInfo.Inker: Amy Searles, Anthony Meloro, Jason Murphy, Josh Burggraf, Josh Freydkis, Victor Kerlow
